definition: Linpien township in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], Taiwan
surname Lin/Japanese surname Hayashi
woods/forest/CL:片[pian4]/circle(s) (i.e. specific group of people)/a collection (of similar things)
side/edge/margin/border/boundary/CL:個|个[ge4]/simultaneously
suffix of a noun of locality
Linpien township in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], Taiwan

sentences.english: And where the road bends a small bridge is suddenly seen.
sentences.chinese: 舊時茅店社林邊，路轉溪橋忽見。

sentences.english: Stopping by Woods on a Snowy Evening has been considered one of the best poems of Robert Frost.
sentences.chinese: 《雪夜林邊駐步》被公認是弗羅斯特最好的詩歌之一。

sentences.english: The ambulance station consisted of three tents, pitched at the edge of a birch copse.
sentences.chinese: 救護站是在小白樺樹林邊塔了三個卷着邊的帳篷。

sentences.english: They liked to tell stories about poor rural people living at the edge of dark forests.
sentences.chinese: 他們喜歡講那些住在深林邊上貧苦農民的故事。

sentences.english: He who lives near the woods is not frightened by owls .
sentences.chinese: 家住林邊梢，貓頭鷹嚇不倒。

sentences.english: A group of children come for a camping in a town near the forest with their teacher.
sentences.chinese: 一羣小孩兒隨老師來到林邊小鎮野營。

sentences.english: The wolves have been howling away on the edge of the forest for hours.
sentences.chinese: 那些狼在林邊一直嚎叫了幾個小時。

sentences.english: You got it good in Timberline, right?
sentences.chinese: 你覺得林邊小鎮很好，對吧？
